OOC: Well I like Astrotrain, plus now when I talk with other transfans,
or am writing my fanfiction I remember to put Astrotrain, so i'm calling
you that.

BIC:
So much was going on at the moment, Megatron whirled. First he awnsered
Astrotrain, "Perhaps, but he may be a nuissance in the future, and I
would like to eliminate nuissances." with that last word he looks at
Firestrike.

"As for you, I am getting tired of you trying to gain power in this
group, at the expence of mine. You have a warrior mentality, and it
shows when you want to eliminate of an intruder one on one. Where was
this one on one mentality earlier when I was fighting Unitron? You got
involved there." Megatron noted. Sinnertwin backed away instinctivly,
knowing that something unpleasant was going to happen.
